author: jimk
msg: HADOOP-2555 Refactor the HTable#get and HTable#getRow methods to avoid repetition of retry-on-failure logic (thanks to Peter Dolan and Bryan Duxbury)

author: jdcasey
msg: Fixing formatting on transitive resolution error (again).

author: bmitchell
msg: Move the curl handler structure from static to the created axis2_libcurl structure.
Make the create/free methods on the axis2_libcurl structure public.
Change http_transport_sender.c and http_sender.c to explicitly create and tear down
the axis2_libcurl structure around the client session.
Add the manage_session flag to the msg_ctx; obtain its value from manage_session flag
If the manage_session flag is enabled, enable CURLOPT_COOKIEFILE.  When the flag
is disabled, clear the remembered cookies.
Add svn:eol-style native to both to remove/add CR characters from Windows

author: sgoeschl
msg: Changes the implementation so it is impossible to use strong encryption/decryption - we are now limited to DES (56 bit)

author: jmargaris
msg: From Michael Mikhaylov: Sample fix to reflect latest code.
